text:
Zednode | San Francisco, CA | Software/Dev Ops Engineers | Part-time | Remote

Zednode(https://zednode.com), a masternode and staking services provider in the cryptocurrency space, is looking for part time software engineers to help scale our web platform and build out our extensive dev ops infrastructure.

Technologies: Java/Scala, Rails, Javascript, React, Elixir, Postgres, Docker, Terraform, Consul, Vault, AWS

Please send an email with subject: HN to info a_t zednode DOT com
